question: Which of the following are the techniques for detection of cancer of internal organs?
(a) Radiography, MRI
(b) MRI, computed tomography
(c) Widal test, radiography
(d) MRI, widal test
explanation: Cancer of internal organs is detected using Radiography (X-rays), CT (Computed Tomography), and MRI (Magnetic Resonance Imaging). Widal test is for Typhoid. Therefore, combinations a and b are correct.
